name: Ring Flight
description:
Learn to fly with the Oculus Rift and Leap Motion, then test yourself against a twisting gauntlet filled with blades, walls, and rings to soar through.

Music by 2Mello for Read Only Memories.

For Leap Motion 3DJam comments, please go here!

Changes

- Changed Unity display resolution option from "Hidden by default" to "always shown" to let players more easily choose the best options for them.
